name: Caveshot
description:
Try to survive against an endless horde of robots and ghosts using only your mouse!

Rack up the largest score you can while trying to stay alive for as long as possible.  Move with the left mouse button, fire by holding down the right mouse button, and blank the screen with the middle mouse button. You die in one hit, so stay alert!

Made for My First Game Jam: Summer 2017.
